lead_paragraph: Newcastle United midfielder Jonjo Shelvey has been charged with misconduct for using abusive and/or insulting language towards a Wolverhampton Wanderers player, the FA said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle's Shelvey Hit With FA Misconduct Charge
headline.main: Newcastle's Shelvey Hit With FA Misconduct Charge

snippet: Newcastle United midfielder Jonjo Shelvey has been charged with misconduct for using abusive and/or insulting language towards a Wolverhampton Wanderers player, the FA said on Tuesday....
